tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sales_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    sale_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE sales_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    quantity_sold INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES inventory(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sold_quantity INT,
    sale_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE inventory (      id INT PRIMARY KEY,      product_name VARCHAR(255),      quantity INT,      price DECIMAL(10, 2) );
CREATE TABLE sales_transactions (      id INT PRIMARY KEY,      product_id INT,      sale_date DATE,      quantity_sold INT,      total_price DECIMAL(10, 2) );
CREATE TABLE inventory_updates (      id INT PRIMARY KEY,      product_id INT,      updated_quantity INT,      update_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE triggers (      id INT PRIMARY KEY,      trigger_name VARCHAR(255),      trigger_action VARCHAR(255),      related_table VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE trigger_logs (      id INT PRIMARY KEY,      trigger_id INT,      log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,      log_message TEXT );
